Dimensions.Description: This dimension ensures that all knowledge produced in the entire SLR lifecycle is managed, i.e., created, shared, reused, adapted, and eliminated.

Dimensions.Description: This dimension ensures the quality and effectiveness of the tools used in the review.
This dimension ensures that all processes to validate each process of SLR (e.g., scope definition, protocol definition, studies selection, data extraction, data synthesis).
